title: The ProFroster - The Original Adjustable Cake Scraper Edge Smoother fondant cake decorating spatula …
feature: This is the REVOLUTIONARY PROFROSTER adjustable cake scraper for applying frosting to cakes that started it all! We have built a reputation among cake professionals and enthusiasts since we started which shows by having over a thousand positive reviews on Instagram.

Create CLEAN SHARP EDGES on your way to a BEAUTIFUL CAKE that all your friends will be talking about. This magnificent product can frost an 8" high (approx. 8 1/8") x 5" across BARREL CAKES and even works on SQUARE CAKES.
It comes in a one of a kind BEAUTIFUL PACKAGE that gives you that feeling of CHRISTMAS DAY when it arrives!

The ProFroster was invented by a professional cake maker to be INDUSTRIAL STRENGTH, durable in design, made from FDA food safe plastic and sporting a logo we can all trust, “Made in the USA”. Oh and did we mention it is dishwasher safe! DISHWASHER SAFE!

In the end we are a company of cake people making products FOR CAKE PEOPLE and you just can’t say that about any of the others. We stand by our product, if you have questions or need tips please visit us at www.profroster.com, where we would love to hear from you!
description: NOW YOU CAN MAKE CAKES LIKE A PROFESSIONAL! Making a cake that is level and has a clean edge is both difficult and time consuming. There are several methods that professionals use to achieve this look, and they take so much time! Even for a professional! The ProFroster is a frosting tool that allows you to get clean straight edges even for taller / barrel cakes that are up to 8 inches high.
